members.name: Itaú Unibanco
members.other_info: Largest private bank in Brazil; headquarters located in São Paulo.

members.name: Santander Brasil
members.other_info: Brazilian branch of the global Santander Group; main office on Avenida Paulista.

members.name: Bradesco
members.other_info: One of the largest private banks in Brazil; headquarters in Osasco (São Paulo metro area).

members.name: Accenture Brasil
members.other_info: Global consulting and technology services company; Brazilian headquarters in São Paulo.

members.name: iFood
members.other_info: Leading food delivery platform in Brazil; headquarters in Osasco (São Paulo metro area).

members.name: Nubank
members.other_info: Brazil’s largest fintech bank; offices located in Pinheiros, São Paulo.

members.name: TOTVS
members.other_info: Brazilian software company specialized in ERP and enterprise solutions.

members.name: 99 (App)
members.other_info: Mobility and food delivery app, part of DiDi Chuxing.

members.name: Mercado Livre Brasil
members.other_info: Latin America’s largest e-commerce platform; major operations in São Paulo metro area.

members.name: Magazine Luiza (Magalu)
members.other_info: Major Brazilian retailer with offices and stores in São Paulo.

members.name: Carrefour Brasil
members.other_info: Brazilian subsidiary of the French retail giant Carrefour; headquarters in São Paulo.

members.name: Viação Cometa
members.other_info: Viação Cometa is a Brazilian intercity bus company founded in 1937. It operates routes connecting São Paulo to various cities in the state and neighboring regions.
